summary: AFTER A RECALL OF DOOR LATCHES THAT WERE REPLACED I HAVE HAD 3 OTHER LATCHES MALFUNCTION.  MOST RECENTLY MY DRIVER SIDE DOOR.  I HAD TALKED TO MY DEALERSHIP AND THEY TOLD ME I AM RESPONSIBLE FOR THE REPAIR NOW.  THEY DID REPAIR ONE LATCH AFTER THE RECALL WORK WAS DONE UNDER WARRANTY.  I CURRENTLY CANNOT SAFELY DRIVE MY VEHICLE!
